pages.text: If you $(l)promote$() to $(l)Player$() you $(l)accept the following Rules$().

pages.title: Respect Others
pages.text: There's $(l)no need$() to say or do things to $(l)make others feel bad or upset$().$(br2)$(l)Trolling$(), generally defined as provoking a person/situation to get a response, is also $(l)not allowed$().

pages.title: Offensive Content
pages.text: While some $(o)minor amount$() of swearing is allowed, $(l)severe or frequent vulgarity$(), especially when $(l)directed at others$(), $(l)is not$().

pages.title: Family friendly chat
pages.text: Chat should be family friendly.$(br)This means $(l)certain subjects are not allowed$() in chat.$(br2)These $(l)include$(), but are $(l)not limited$() to, discussions about $(l)sex, politics, religion or drugs.$()

pages.title: No Advertising
pages.text: $(l)Advertising other $()$(o)Minecraft Servers$()$(l) or other $()$(o)Discord Servers$()$(l) is strictly banned.$()$(br2)You also $(l)may not advertise:$()$(li)Websites$(li)YT Channels$(li)Twitch Streams$(br2)Or $(l)anything$() else if it's $(l)not related$() to the $(l)Aged Modpack Server.$()

pages.title: No Spamming
pages.text: $(o)Spamming is filling the chat with multiple unneeded characters or messages.$()$(br2)$(l)Don't do it.$()$(br2)This rule $(l)also applies$() to $(l)spamming commands$() that don't necessarily show up in chat.

pages.title: No Cheating
pages.text: $(l)Cheating in any form isn't allowed.$()$(br2)$(o)Anything that is considered to give you an unfair advantage over other players is considered cheating.$()$(br2)This can include but isn't limited to:$(li)Client mods$(li)Abusing server bugs$(li)Duplicating items / blocks$(li)Generating things while afk

pages.title: No Griefing
pages.text: $(o)Griefing is considered destroying or changing another players property or bulidings without their consent in any protected area.$()$(br2)This $(l)includes stealing$() as well.

pages.title: Don't Scam
pages.text: $(o)Scamming is taking money, items, work, or anything else of value from another player dishonestly.$()
